name: Army Men RTS
description: Army Men RTS brings you back to the days of staging battles with tiny plastic soldiers in your backyard...except these green soldiers carry out your every command!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 10 Processor: 1.4 GHz or faster Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 3D Graphics card compatible with DirectX 9.0 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 350 MB available space Additional Notes: Multiplayer is not supported
